commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** Expert: * * If set, omit term freq, and optionally positions and payloads from * postings for this field. * *

NOTE: While this option reduces storage space * required in the index, it also means any query * requiring positional information, such as {@link * PhraseQuery} or {@link SpanQuery} subclasses will * fail with an exception. */ void setIndexOptions(IndexOptions indexOptions);
commits.sourceOld:
/** Expert: * * If set, omit term freq, positions and payloads from * postings for this field. * *

NOTE: While this option reduces storage space * required in the index, it also means any query * requiring positional information, such as {@link * PhraseQuery} or {@link SpanQuery} subclasses will * fail with an exception. */ void setOmitTermFreqAndPositions(boolean omitTermFreqAndPositions);
